hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT TOP (1) rowNumberAlias FROM( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY q_.sortOrderAlias) AS rowNumberAlias FROM( SELECT DISTINCT bookAlias.Guid AS bookGuidAlias , bookheadwo2_.DefaultHeadword AS defaultHeadwordAlias , bookheadwo2_.XmlEntryId AS xmlEntryIdAlias , bookheadwo2_.SortOrder AS sortOrderAlias FROM Book bookAlias INNER JOIN BookVersion bookversio1_ ON bookAlias.LastVersion = bookversio1_.Id INNER JOIN BookHeadword bookheadwo2_ ON bookversio1_.Id = bookheadwo2_.BookVersion ) AS q_ ) AS query WHERE query.xmlEntryIdAlias = :xmlEntryId and query.bookGuidAlias = :bookGuid ORDER BY query.rowNumberAlias;

SELECT TOP (1) rowNumberAlias FROM( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY q_.sortOrderAlias) AS rowNumberAlias FROM( SELECT DISTINCT bookAlias.Guid AS bookGuidAlias , bookheadwo2_.DefaultHeadword AS defaultHeadwordAlias , bookheadwo2_.XmlEntryId AS xmlEntryIdAlias , bookheadwo2_.SortOrder AS sortOrderAlias FROM Book bookAlias INNER JOIN BookVersion bookversio1_ ON bookAlias.LastVersion = bookversio1_.Id INNER JOIN BookHeadword bookheadwo2_ ON bookversio1_.Id = bookheadwo2_.BookVersion WHERE bookAlias.Id IN( :bookIds ) ) AS q_ ) AS query WHERE query.xmlEntryIdAlias = :xmlEntryId and query.bookGuidAlias = :bookGuid ORDER BY query.rowNumberAlias;
